# PR Checklist

## Summary

- Describe the problem and highlight the solution.
- Link related issues, tickets, or design docs.

## Testing

- [ ] `npm run lint`
- [ ] `npm run format:check`
- [ ] `npm run typecheck`
- [ ] `npm run build`

## Checklist

- [ ] Added/updated tests as needed.
- [ ] Updated documentation, copy, or comments.
- [ ] Checked responsive states and dark mode when applicable.
- [ ] Verified analytics/telemetry updates when applicable.
- [ ] Notified QA or stakeholders about relevant changes.

## Additional Notes

- Include screenshots, Looms, or other context to help reviewers.
